maqras.text: Tha Ha Tuhan nyang teupeue meukeusud ayat Sabab Hadharat hana Neupeugah
Kon Kamoe peutron Quran bak gata Mangat jeuet gata tarasa sosah
Meulengkan mangat jeuet keu peuingat Keu soe nyang takot dijih keu Allah
Tren nibak Tuhan nyang peujeuet bumoe Ngon langet dum nyoe nyang manyang leupah
Tuhan Peumurah Maha Perkasa Neumat kuasa di ateueh ‘arasy
Peue nyang di langet ngon nyang di bumoe Ngon bandum asoe jih milek Allah Nyang di yup tanoh han deueh takalon Pih milek Tuhan nyang Maha Murah
Adak tamarit rayok suara Mandum rahsia Neuteupeue sudah Bandum Neuteupeue bahle nyang meusom
Tan laen Tuhan meulengkan Allah Le nama Tuhan bandum nyang got-got Di sinan meuhat Tuhan Neupeugah
Peue na bak gata troeh haba Musa

Youh geu-eu cahya apui nyang mirah Geukheun bak ahligeuh tinggal gata Lon kalon cahya apui trang leupah Mangat lon peuwoe apui nyan keu noe Jeuet digata nyoe tatueng phaedah Atawa pih na sinan peutunyok Sinan jeuet tacok kadang phaedah
Troh Musa keu nan deuh treuk suara Deungo hai Musa jinoe Lon peugah
Keubit nyoekeuh Lon Tuhan po gata Tasuet le sigra kawoh takeubah g Kawoh bak gaki tasuet bandua Jinoe na gata bak tempat indah Teumpat nyang suci bak urong Thua
Lon pileh gata nyang raya tuah Lon pileh gata tadeungo jinoe Wahyu bak Kamoe jinoe meupeugah
Nyoekeuh Lon Allah tan laen Tuhan i Meulengkan cit lon sidroe taseumah Peubuet sembahyang keu lon taingat
Teuma kiamat deungo lon peugah € Uroe kiamat han jeuet han teuka Teuma rahsia han jeuet Lon peugah Pajan wateejih Lon som bak gata Watee nyan hamba bandum geubalah
Teuma bek gata roh jipeupaleng Le jih nyang han tem iman keu Allah Nyang han tem iman akan kiamat Dijih peuturot napsu seurakah Meu taturot jih gata binasa
Teuma hai Musa tacuba peugah Bak jaroe uneunteuh peue nyan tamat
Geukheun nyoe tungkat lon keu peukakah Ngon tungkat lon nyoe jeuet lon meuteugon Lon paroh kameng meujan ‘oh salah. Maksud laen pih le ngon tungkat ‘Oh watee lon mat cit le phaedah
Neukheun boh tatiek tungkat hai Musa
Geutiek treuk sigra sinan geukeubah ‘Oh ban geukalon ka jeuet keu uleue Watee nyan jiʻeue laju that bagah
Neukheun boh tacok jih bek tatakot Kamoe peusurot tungkat lom bagah Meuwoe lagei sot tungkatteuh teuma
Bak geutiek teuma jaroeteuh siblah Tapeuduek jaroe lam geutiek gata ‘Oh tasuet lanja hu mejeureulah Puteh meukeuprak kon jeuet keucacat Nyan saboh ayat laen lon peugah
Kamoe peuleumah nyan ubak gata Mvuʻjizat raya Kamoe bri tuah
Ubak Peuraʻeun tajak leh gata Jih darohaka jipeubuet salah
Geukheun Tuhanku Neupeuhah dada Lon Neubri sigra akal nyang ceudah
Neubri beu mudah urusan lon nyoe
Bak lidah lon nyoe pih na meukilah Neubri beu teuploh lidah lon beu got
Watee lon marit jiteupue bagah
Neubri ahli lon jeuet keumentroe lon
Harun aduen lon Neubri meutuah
Neubri beu kuat lon deungon gopnyan
Beu jeuet keurakan lon ba peurintah
Jeuet kamoe ucap beu le teuseubeh Keudroe-Neuh lebeh nibak nyang sudah
Jeuet kamoe ingat droe-Neuh beu le that
Droe-Neuh nyang lihat kamoe ya Allah
Neukheun ka geubri peue nyang talakee Hai Musa teuntee hana meuilah
Saboh treuk nikmat mubri keu gata Youh mantong gata ubit that leupah
Kamoe bri wahyu ubak ma gata

Tatiek jih sigra lam tong takeubah Tatiek tong lam krueng jiba u bineh Sinan na soe preh jicok jih bagah Musoh lon nyang cok ngon musoh jih nyan Jigaseh jih nyan sayangjih leupah Ka lon tiek gaseh bak jih keu gata Nyak jipeulihara gata jipapah Lon ngieng ngon kalon na jihiroteuh

Youh nyan cutdateuh keunan geulangkah Geukheun bak lon na si tem peulihara Keunoe jeuet taba bek le takeubah ` Kamoe peuwoe treuk gata bak mateuh ; Seunang that mateuh hana le susah Teuma na ureueng nyang tapoh mate Kamoe puweh le gata meupeuglah Mangat bek susah gata deungon nyan Teuma ujian gata le leupah Mewuji gata ngon peungalaman Teuma u Madyan keudeh talangkah Padum thon sabe gata di sinan Teuma ‘oh Iheueh nyan mubri peurintah Teuma troh gata laju hai Musa Bak watee kada teupat that leupah
Lon peujeuet gata keu utusan Lon Geunantoe droe Lon jak ba peurintah
Tajak ngon aduenteuh jinoe gata Ayat Lon taba dum tajak peugah Bek lalee gata taingat keu Lon
Ubak Peuraʻeun jinoe talangkah Sabab Peuraʻeun ka darohaka Peue-peue nyang hawa jipeubuet sudah
Tapeugah beu got le gata dua Bek narit gasa nyang jeuet keusalah Kadang pih jitem jeuet keu peuingat Got pih jitakot watee tapeugah
Kheun gopnyan dua wahe Po kamoe Teumakot kamoe kamoe jigagah Teumakot kamoe keu jielanya Get darohaka pih jih keu Allah
Neukheun bek yoteuh Lon sajan gata Lon deungo nyata peue nyang jipeugah Lon kalon keudroe bandum perkara

Tajak banduateuh laju bagah Tapeugah kamoe Rasul Po gata Neuyue bak gata keu noe meulangkah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe Bek le lagee nyou buetteuh that salah Bek taazeueb dum Bani Israil Kamoe ba dalil Neubri le Allah Kamcoe ba ayat nibak Po gata Salam seujahtra soe ikot Allah Soe nyang tem ikot peutunyok Tuhan
Meunyo kon meunan azeueb that leupah Ka Neubri wahyu bak kamoe dua Raya that seksa si nyang buet salah À Si nyang han pateh ji paleng muka
Peuraʻeun sigra teuma jipeugah Boh soe Tuhanteuh gata bandua Peugah hai Musa bak lon beu bagah
Geukheun Po kamoe nyang bri peuneujeuet ‘Oh Iheueh Neupeujeuet Neubri hidayah Bandum makhluk peuneujeuet Tuhan
Seuot Peuraʻeun tacuba peugah Pakriban dilee dum ureueng jameun
Atra nyan geukheun ileumee Allah Ileumee nyan dum na bak Tuhan lon Lam kitab sinan bandum Neupeugah Hana tom silap sagai Tuhan lon Tuwo-Neuh pih tan hana tom salah

Tuhan nyang peujeuet bumoe keu gata Takalon rupa lagee sajadah S Neubri jeuet gata tapeugot jalan Jeuet ban sabohnyan tajak meulangkah Sideh di langet Neupeutren ujeuen Tanom tanaman timoh le bagah Kamoe peuteubiet meupasang-pasang Le that tanaman hana ban peugah

Tapajoh nyan dum jeuet keumakanan Binatangteuh nyan galakjih leupah Binatang ternak jeuet tabri umpeuen Jimeurot sinan umpeuen jih mudah Atra nyan bandum cit jeuet keutanda Soe Ihok bicara jitueng phaedah
